thread.title: Arsenal star Ozil misses training with back injury
thread.title_full: Arsenal star Ozil misses training with back injury

title: Arsenal star Ozil misses training with back injury
text:
Arsenal star Ozil misses training with back injury Getty 0 24-Mar-2017 15:26:27 The 28-year-old missed the victory over England with a hamstring problem and he could now be unavailable for Sunday's clash with Azerbaijan 
Arsenal midfielder Mesut Ozil missed Germany training on Friday after suffering a back injury. 
Arsenal & Bayern fined by UEFA 
The former Real Madrid star missed the Gunners's final Premier League match before the international break with a hamstring problem that also ruled him out of Wednesday's friendly win over England. 
And Ozil has now picked up another injury that could yet see him miss Die Mannschaft 's World Cup qualifier against Azerbaijan on Sunday. 
The 28-year-old has travelled with the rest of the squad to Baku, though Borussia Dortmund midfielder Julian Weigl has returned to his club. 
Weigl picked up a thigh injury in the win over England and was replaced in the second half by Emre Can. Related
